Description:
-------------
Developed jointly by "Infinity Ward" and "Sledgehammer Games", Modern Warfare 3 is set in a world on the brink of annihilation in which terrorist organization Makarov and trigger the destruction and chaos throughout the world. Playing as a member of several special forces units and armed with advanced weaponry, players work with Delta operators and meet familiar characters to enter a dangerous game of "cat-and-mouse" while competing throughout the world to stop a madman before it is too late.
